trans-unit.source: Enables the creation of service routes over HTTP for WCF Services with support for extension-less base addresses.

When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceRoute> constructor is called, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] will add the corresponding route prefix (url pattern) and a (hidden) route handler to the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>, and cache the corresponding route prefix, service host factory and service type info into an internal hash table for future service activation.Note: if developers directly manipulate the route collection on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceRoute> which has been added to the collection, the change may not be granted by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceRoute>呼叫建構函式時，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]將對應的路由前置字元 （url 模式） 和 （隱藏） 的路由處理常式加入 ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>，並快取的對應為路由前置字元，服務主機處理站和服務類型資訊未來的服務啟動的內部雜湊資料表。注意： 如果開發人員直接操作上的路由集合<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceRoute>的已加入至集合，變更可能不會授與[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] changing elements in a route collection, see <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)]如需在路由集合中變更項目的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that developers define all <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceRoute> in the global.asax file and do not remove a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceRoute> from the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection> dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 建議開發人員在 global.asax 檔案中定義所有 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceRoute>，而且不要以動態方式從 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceRoute> 中移除 <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceRoute" /> class with the specified route prefix, service host factory, and service type.
